name: SURVIVAL SH00T-EM^
description:
SURVIVAL SH00T-EM^ is a shoot-em that is in its early stages, but is playable.

Somethings may change when the game is finished. 

Controls:

W = Up

A = Left

S = Down

D = Right

Keypad 4 = Fire

Its free to download and give me some feedback to help improve the game.
